title: How to build equity in the workplace - Quora

response.answer_text: My take is that focusing on being productive even to the extreme of being a workplace champion in some for-profit entities is the best way to build that ‘equity’ (i.e., in the sense that your particular contribution is vital to the continued existence of the firm. ) Monetary equity means simply that all the benefit$ offered are taken advantage of to the limit - even at the expense of reducing ones living standard now to achieve that if necessary). Carver Wrightman alias Cecil R. Williams
